law.catch_line: A person is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 if t...
law.text:
A person is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 if the person:
fails to comply promptly with process that the Legislative Auditor issues under this Part IV of this subtitle; or
violates any provision of § 2-1224(b) or § 2-1226 of this subtitle.
